name: Infinitoggle
description:
Infinitoggle is a hypercasual/puzzle game hybrid in which you toggle colorful switches to bring balance between the colors in infinite randomly-generated levels.

Includes colorblind accessibility option

Check out Loot Grind Simulator on Steam!

Thank you for playing! Wishlist my next game on Steam!
